category-def.name: Project Matcher
category-def.label: Project Matcher
category-def.description: Project Matcher (JDT) provides the possibility to hide all not important projects in the Package Explorer in a quick way.

category-def.name: Subversive History Matcher
category-def.label: Subversive History Matcher
category-def.description: Subversive History Matcher provides the functionality to hide all unimportant log entries in the History.
